top10_tweets_like: New #rstats package preview: {mapboxapi}.  Use @Mapbox web services APIs in your #rspatial data science projects.  Check out some examples at https://t.co/p5g15fHpxe and in the thread below https://t.co/Cz2a0LtRrr

New (very early stage) small #rstats package to use a published @observablehq notebook as an R htmlwidget.

It allows to display an entire notebook or only a specific cell, and to update notebook values directly from R.

https://t.co/UPaIilNfCd https://t.co/OEBckuzUCM

A üî•üî• function in #rstats is: 

scales::show_col(palette) 

will show you the colors in palette and label them! Seriously super helpful when deciding on a palette to use for your graphics. I can't remember who pointed this out to me. Was it @W_R_Chase? https://t.co/PO6nbsMQF1
